name: Son of a Gun
description:
[Submission to GMTK 2021 Game Jam]

In Son of a Gun you need to save your father from imminent death.

He has been missing and you have been searching.

After months you got a lead.

His heart was stolen by his failed experiments.

All you have is a strange gun he gave you.

Take his heart and maybe you will get your father back in whole.

Creators: MOLDY GAMERS TEAM: Game Design & Concept

Marcel "BloodyEdward" Dąbrowski

Cyprian "SirCypkowskyy" Gburek

Konstantin "BountyH" Pschenychny
